summary.para: The CTL_FIND_SUBJECT_PARA structure contains data used by with a dwFindType parameter of CTL_FIND_SUBJECT to find a Certificate Trust List (CTL).
The size, in bytes, of this structure.
A pointer to a structure. Can be NULL if there is no need to reference the CTL_FIND_USAGE_PARA parameters when finding a CTL.

For CTL_CERT_SUBJECT_TYPE, the pvSubject member points to a . The CTL's SubjectAlgorithm is examined to determine the representation of the subject's identity. Initially, only SHA1 or MD5 hash will be supported. The appropriate hash property is obtained from the CERT_CONTEXT.
For CTL_ANY_SUBJECT_TYPE, pvSubject points to the structure that contains the SubjectAlgorithm to be matched in the CTL and the SubjectIdentifier to be matched in one of the CTL entries.
The value of the pvSubject member depends upon the value of the dwSubjectType member. For more information, see dwSubjectType.
